column4: Hi, i am just trying to create a partition as reiserfs but getting an error filesystem tools not installed and i do not know which packages would be required now
reiserfs is a dying filesystem, is there a particular reason you want to use it?
actually not really... but i want to use the virtualbox and it is complaining about ext4
What is the exact error you are getting from Virtualbox?
one sec... need to start again
need 5 mins... i just formated the partition where i had the vb harddisks
